page.title: 16The Flower Festival-Horndon
page.content: The Flower Festival in the Parish Church is an important, beautiful and colourful activity which takes place during the annual Feast and Fayre. The original charter stated that the Feast and Fayre should be connected with the Patron Saints of the Church. Each year Margaret Leigh and her team of flower arrangers work vey hard to get the display ready. They show a different theme each year. This year they have chosen Fact or Fiction, and the various flower arrangements show different stories from the Old Testament. They attempted to show how in some cases history and legend have been combined in the actual writing of familiar stories from the Old Testament of the Bible. Many people listen to the musical items arranged by M. & J. Rawlinson.
